DOC.brief_summary: Asthma among low-income , minority child remain prime example health disparity resistant change . Controlled demonstration reduction disproportionate hospital emergency care limited . We perform controlled clinical trial `` Asthma Coach '' reduce hospitalization among low-income , African American child .
DOC.criteria: 28 year age Admitted hospital acute asthma African American ethnicity Medicaid coverage Parent refusal sign consent Living outside service area
